EmailTemplate.name: 2019.10.15 - Implied Consent - Ergo at home.Implied Consent - Ergo at home
EmailTemplate.subject: Celebrate Ergo Month!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
It’s All About Ergonomics, All Month Long! Your workspace at the office may be set up with ergonomics in mind but is your home office? If it’s not, don’t worry, you’re in the right place. Find out how to make your home office more ergonomic with these tips and ideas.
